childMarkdownRemark.html:
As a Full-stack developer with experience in both software development and system administration, I have worked extensively with various tools and technologies related to automating software deployments and configuring CI/CD pipelines. Skilled in monitoring systems and improving software quality, some of my favorite tools include Debian, Docker, Nginx, Python, Flask, CircleCI, Linode and AWS. I am passionate about learning new technologies and sharing my knowledge with others; using DevOps best practices to improve everyone's lives.

In my previous roles, I've provided support to multiple development teams and have a good understanding of the software development process.
